content:
Schitt's Creek has a total of 6 seasons, with 80 episodes. Each episode is around 22 minutes long, making it a quick and easy binge.

Here's the breakdown:

* Season 1: 13 episodes (2015)
* Season 2: 13 episodes (2016)
* Season 3: 13 episodes (2017)
* Season 4: 13 episodes (2018)
* Season 5: 14 episodes (2019)
* Season 6: 14 episodes (2020)

You can easily binge a few episodes a night, and before you know it, you'll be hooked on the lovable Rose family and the quirky residents of Schitt's Creek.

If you're new to the show, I recommend starting from the beginning to get the full context and character development. But if you're short on time, you can also jump into a later season and still enjoy the show.
